name: @mcpjam/sdk
description: Official MCPJam SDK with reusable client utilities
author: MCPJam (https://mcpjam.com)

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean --silent && npm run --prefix ./mcp-client-manager clean --silent
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:bundle
scripts.build:bundle: tsup index.ts mcp-client-manager/index.ts --clean --format esm,cjs --dts --sourcemap --out-dir dist --external @modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external ai
scripts.dev: tsup index.ts mcp-client-manager/index.ts --watch --format esm,cjs --dts --sourcemap --out-dir dist --external @modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external ai
